product_name: Overland Equipment Pixley Shoulder Bag - Women's
long_description: Cute and super compact, the Pixley Shoulder Bag from Overland Equipment is so well organized it holds as much as a bag twice its size! Main compartment is remarkably roomy and is lined with a fun print. Front organizer pocket with rip-and-stick closure features card slots, a key fob, zippered mesh pocket and fleece-lined pocket. Fleece-lined interior pocket is perfect for protecting a cell phone or pair of glasses from scratches. Adjustable 1.5 in. webbing strap with buckle unclips so you can wear the bag around your waist if desired. The women's Pixley Shoulder Bag from Overland Equipment is made of durable ballistic nylon with a smooth nylon lining.
short_description: Cute and super compact, the Pixley Shoulder Bag from Overland Equipment is so well organized it holds as much as a bag twice its size!
